Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing at Howard due to signal problems. 

Shuttle buses are available from Skokie to Howard to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #97 Skokie bus for alternate service.

Allow extra travel time.
